comment.body:
> [nofish](#comment_174_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Nothing special, you won't see your own comments

This is not so helpful.
The most spam is coming from Chinese on English sites.
Is it not possible to enable only certain character sets by submitting ? Or a single character set ?
Even returning to pure ASCII would be much better.
